data.title: Twenty Four Sonnets of Giosue Carducci by Carducci, Giosue; translated into English by Arthur Burkhard: Very Good Soft cover (1947)
data.meta_description: Soft cover - The Register Press, Yarmouth Port, Massachusetts - 1947 - Condition: Very Good - Carducci (1835-1907) was the first Italian to be awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature, in 1906. The book is unmarked; slight curl to the top edge; wraps chipped and edgeworn; sleeve protected. - Twenty Four Sonnets of Giosue Carducci
